rows.label: qst201708_msg0001
rows.name:
This is where we were told
to go to find out about
the training maneuver.

rows.label: qst201708_msg0002
rows.name: Newt-dono! Sorry to keep you waiting!

rows.label: qst201708_msg0003
rows.name:
The men are very excited to
have you joining us today!

rows.label: qst201708_msg0004
rows.name: Seems like a pretty large-scale thing.

rows.label: qst201708_msg0005
rows.name:
That's right. Today we're running
a simulated invasion of Hadashal
Palace by hostile forces.

rows.label: qst201708_msg0006
rows.name:
More than half the garrison
here are taking part. It's
not a small operation.

rows.label: qst201708_msg0007
rows.name:
Intense. You don't see this
kind of thing every day.

rows.label: qst201708_msg0008
rows.name:
You lot will be on the
hostile side. You'll be
gunning for the Emperor.

rows.label: qst201708_msg0009
rows.name: So what do we have to do exactly?

rows.label: qst201708_msg0010
rows.name:
Your job is to scout the
city's defenses and try to
break into the palace.

rows.label: qst201708_msg0011
rows.name:
Intercept His Majesty the Emperor
and try to take him down.

rows.label: qst201708_msg0012
rows.name: T-take down the Emperor?

rows.label: qst201708_msg0013
rows.name: Got it. We're the bad guys.

rows.label: qst201708_msg0014
rows.name:
Playing the part of the enemy
sounds like it could be an
eye-opening experience for us.

rows.label: qst201708_msg0015
rows.name:
Our ultimate goal is to take down the
Emperor, then... Well, I suppose
that's one way to get to meet him!

rows.label: qst201708_msg0016
rows.name: Woo! I'm all fired up now!

rows.label: qst201708_msg0017
rows.name:
We'll be attempting to neutralize
your incursion at all costs.

rows.label: qst201708_msg0018
rows.name:
You won't find it easy to
get close to His Majesty.

rows.label: qst201708_msg0019
rows.name:
I wouldn't want anything
less. No holding back, yeah?

rows.label: qst201708_msg0020
rows.name:
We'll be starting the
exercise in just a moment.

rows.label: qst201708_msg0021
rows.name: Are you all set?

rows.label: qst201708_msg0022
rows.name: Ready as we'll ever be!

rows.label: qst201708_msg0023
rows.name: Can you give us just a moment?

rows.label: qst201708_msg0024
rows.name:
Understood! Then let's get
this show on the road!

rows.label: qst201708_msg0025
rows.name:
Understood. The scheduled
start time is fast approaching.
Please make haste.

rows.label: qst201708_msg0026
rows.name:
Hello there, Newt-dono! How's
the prep coming along?

rows.label: qst201708_msg0027
rows.name: Ready to get started?
